title: Record-Keeping
section: Section 2 — Requirements for High-Risk AI Systems
summary: Article 12 requires that high-risk AI systems technically support automatic logging over their entire lifetime. Logging must provide sufficient traceability to identify situations where the system may create risks, support post-market monitoring, and monitor ongoing operation, particularly in relation to deployers’ obligations. For certain Annex III systems, logs must at minimum record usage periods, the reference database used, matched input data, and the identity of human verifiers involved in result checking.
